metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5200 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The trace functionality in libvdpau before 1.1.1, when used in a setuid or setgid application, allows local users to write to arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5200` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvdpau1 - 0.7-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvdpau package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.7-1ubuntu0.1').
